mapper.insert: insert into movie (movie_id, movie_name, movie_start_time, movie_duration, director, star, introduction, score, poster_image, issuing_region) values (#{movie.movieId}, #{movie.movieName}, #{movie.movieStartTime}, #{movie.movieDuration}, #{movie.director}, #{movie.star}, #{movie.introduction}, #{movie.score}, #{movie.posterImage}, #{movie.issuingRegion})
